items.name: OneColumnLayout

items.description: A one column responsive container with a max-width on desktop to ultra wide screens

items.description: A two column responsive container with a max-width on desktop to ultra wide screens

items.name: ThreeColumnLayout
items.title: Three Column Layout
items.description: A three column responsive container with a max-width on desktop to ultra wide screens

items.name: ThreeSectionLayout
items.title: Three Section Layout
items.description: A responsive one-column container divided into 3 sections for a header, content and footer with a max-width on desktop to ultra wide screens

items.name: FullScreenHero
items.title: Full Screen Hero Layout
items.description: A responsive one-column container divided into X sections that fill up the entire viewport with a max-width on desktop to ultra wide screens

items.title: Card Grid Layout
items.description: A responsive grid layout where each grid item is uniform in size

items.name: HolyGrailLayout
items.title: Holy Grail Layout
items.description: A responsive grid layout with 5 sections: a header, left section, middle content, right section and footer

items.name: BentoGrid
items.title: Bento Grid Layout
items.description: A responsive grid layout that's inspired by the traditional Japanese bento box
